36:     def dojo_register_module_path(*args)
37:       module_name, module_path = *args
38:       module_path = drails_javascript_path(module_name) unless module_path
39:       "dojo.registerModulePath(\"#{module_name}\", \"#{module_path}\");\n"
40:     end

drails_javascript_path(path) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/drails/dojo_helper.rb, line 42
42:     def drails_javascript_path(path)
43:       javascript_path(path).gsub(/\.js$/, "")
44:     end

    # File lib/drails/dojo_helper.rb, line 20
20:     def javascript_include_dojo(options = nil)
21:       default_options = { :drails => true, :build => false }
22:       options = default_options.merge(options || {})
23: 
24:       if options[:build]
25:         concat javascript_include_tag "release/dojo/dojo/dojo"
26:         concat javascript_include_tag "release/dojo/dojo/#{options[:build]}"
27:       else
28:         concat javascript_include_tag "dojo/dojo/dojo"
29:         javascript_tag do
30:           dojo_register_module_path("drails", drails_javascript_path("dojo/drails")) +
31:                   dojo_require("drails.common")
32:         end
33:       end
34:     end
